definition: straight/to straighten/fair and reasonable/frank/straightforward/(indicates continuing motion or action)/vertical/vertical downward stroke in Chinese characters
surname Zhi/Zhi (c. 2000 BC), fifth of the legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God

sentences.english: D. Hold tubing until fluid is instilled .
sentences.chinese: 握住肛管直至液體全部注入。

sentences.english: Spread abundant quantities of cream and massage carefully until absorbed.
sentences.chinese: 塗抹足量的霜，並且仔細按摩，直至完全吸收。

sentences.english: Until today germanium is the present substance on earth with no exception.
sentences.chinese: 直至今天鍺才毫無異議地成爲地球上是純淨的物質。

sentences.english: We must carry on with the investigation until all the facts are found.
sentences.chinese: 我們必須繼續查訊，直至真相大白。

sentences.english: For most newer vehicles, turn the cap until you hear it click three times.
sentences.chinese: 對於新汽車來說，擰緊蓋子，直至聽到響三下。

sentences.english: I kept laughing from Thursday till last night as the result of made me too exhausted.
sentences.chinese: 我一直在笑，從週四，直至昨晚的結果令我太疲勞。

sentences.english: Relax in the patio furniture until you get kicked out.
sentences.chinese: 坐在戶外傢俱用品上小憩，直至被踢。

sentences.english: Cover the wok, and braise for 10 minutes over medium low heat until the potatoes are quite tender.
sentences.chinese: 蓋上鑊蓋，以中低火燜10分鐘直至薯仔較腍身。

sentences.english: Slide and tap in reservoir retainer clips until tab locks to housing.
sentences.chinese: 滑動並敲擊貯油槽扣件夾，直至凸耳鎖緊外殼。

sentences.english: Deep-fry the spring rolls until golden.
To date, no researcher has claimed that genes can determine sexual orientation.
sentences.chinese: 直至今日，沒有研究人士聲稱基因可以決定性取向。

sentences.english: The valley bottoms out by the river.
sentences.chinese: 山谷地勢漸低直至河邊。

sentences.english: He kneads you until you are pliant;
sentences.chinese: 他揉捏你們，直至你們柔順。

sentences.english: Pour over chicken-vegetable mixture, and toss to combine.
sentences.chinese: 把雞肉和蔬菜混合，攪拌直至完全融合。

sentences.english: Late 2005, the nuclear standoff in North Korea is coming to a boil.
sentences.chinese: 直至2005，看似平和的核危機將於北韓再度升溫。

sentences.english: Committing a foul results in points being deducted from a boxer's score or even disqualification.
sentences.chinese: 犯規要扣掉犯規者的分數，直至取消比賽資格。

definition: until/(used in combination with words like 到[dao4] or 至[zhi4] in constructs of the form 到...為止|到...为止)
to wait until/by the time when (sth is ready etc)
a moment ago/just now/(indicating sth happening later than expected)/(preceded by a clause of condition or reason) not until/(followed by a numerical clause) only
to (a place)/until (a time)/up to/to go/to arrive/(verb complement denoting completion or result of an action)
